mapper.select: SELECT SEQ, COMPANY_SEQ AS COMPANYSEQ, ORGAN_SEQ AS ORGANSEQ, MEMBER_SEQ AS MEMBERSEQ, ISSUANCE_DATE AS ISSUANCEDATE, EXPIRE_DATE AS EXPIREDATE, COUPON_NO AS COUPONNO, ISSUANCE_AMOUNT AS ISSUANCEAMOUNT, REMAIN_AMOUNT AS REMAINAMOUNT, REMAIN_COUNT AS REMAINCOUNT, STATUS AS STATUS, SEND_TYPE AS SENDTYPE, SEND_INFO AS SENDINFO, SEND_COUNT AS SENDCOUNT, CREATE_DATE AS CREATEDATE, MODIFY_DATE AS MODIFYDATE FROM TB_COUPON_ISSUANCE

SELECT A.SEQ, C.NAME AS COMPANYNAME, O.NAME AS ORGANNAME, M.NAME AS MEMBERNAME, A.ISSUANCE_DATE AS ISSUANCEDATE, A.EXPIRE_DATE AS EXPIREDATE, A.COUPON_NO AS COUPONNO, A.COUPON_TYPE AS COUPONTYPE, A.ISSUANCE_AMOUNT AS ISSUANCEAMOUNT, A.REMAIN_AMOUNT AS REMAINAMOUNT, A.REMAIN_COUNT AS REMAINCOUNT, A.STATUS AS STATUS, A.SEND_TYPE AS SENDTYPE, A.SEND_INFO AS SENDINFO, A.SEND_COUNT AS SENDCOUNT, A.CREATE_DATE AS CREATEDATE, A.MODIFY_DATE AS MODIFYDATE FROM TB_COUPON_ISSUANCE A LEFT JOIN TB_COMPANY C ON A.COMPANY_SEQ = C.SEQ LEFT JOIN TB_ORGANIZATION O ON A.ORGAN_SEQ = O.SEQ LEFT JOIN TB_MEMBER M ON A.MEMBER_SEQ = M.SEQ WHERE 1=1 AND DATE_FORMAT(A.ISSUANCE_DATE, '%Y%m%d') BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND A.COMPANY_SEQ = ${companySeq}
-- 하위 계층에 속하는 모든 조직 조회 AND A.ORGAN_SEQ IN (SELECT A.SEQ FROM TB_ORGANIZATION A INNER JOIN (WITH RECURSIVE CTE AS (SELECT ${organSeq} AS SEQ UNION SELECT B.SEQ FROM TB_ORGANIZATION B INNER JOIN CTE ON B.PARENT_SEQ = CTE.SEQ) SELECT SEQ FROM CTE) WR ON A.SEQ = WR.SEQ)
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO TB_COUPON_ISSUANCE (COMPANY_SEQ, ORGAN_SEQ, MEMBER_SEQ, ISSUANCE_DATE, EXPIRE_DATE, COUPON_NO, COUPON_TYPE, ISSUANCE_AMOUNT, REMAIN_AMOUNT, REMAIN_COUNT, STATUS, SEND_TYPE, SEND_INFO, SEND_COUNT) VALUES (#{companySeq}, #{organSeq}, #{memberSeq}, #{issuanceDate}, #{expireDate}, CONCAT(#{couponNo}, (nextval('COUPON'))), #{couponType}, #{issuanceAmount}, #{remainAmount}, #{remainCount}, #{status}, #{sendType}, #{sendInfo}, #{sendCount}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE COMPANY_SEQ = #{companySeq}, ORGAN_SEQ = #{organSeq}, MEMBER_SEQ = #{memberSeq}, ISSUANCE_DATE = #{issuanceDate}, EXPIRE_DATE = #{expireDate}, COUPON_TYPE = #{couponType}, ISSUANCE_AMOUNT = #{issuanceAmount}, REMAIN_AMOUNT = #{remainAmount}, REMAIN_COUNT = #{remainCount}, STATUS = #{status}, SEND_TYPE = #{sendType}, SEND_INFO = #{sendInfo}, SEND_COUNT = #{sendCount}, MODIFY_DATE = NOW()
SELECT COUPON_NO AS COUPONNO FROM TB_COUPON_ISSUANCE WHERE ISSUANCE_DATE = #{issuanceDate} AND EXPIRE_DATE = #{expireDate} AND COUPON_NO LIKE CONCAT(#{couponNo}, '%')
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_COUPON_ISSUANCE SET STATUS = #{status}, MODIFY_DATE = NOW() WHERE COUPON_NO = #{couponNo}
UPDATE TB_COUPON_ISSUANCE SET SEND_COUNT = SEND_COUNT + 1, MODIFY_DATE = NOW() WHERE COUPON_NO = #{couponNo}
